website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you have large or stubborn tags and moles, but be advised that it can be damaging to skin. Taking precautions to protect surrounding skin can help minimize redness and irritation.
pros: Cream formula works well for most skin tags and moles
A little goes a long way
Can remove large tags and moles with several treatments
cons: Although the company touts it as homeopathic, it contains chemical ingredients that can cause pain and irritation
Some customers gripe about scars after moles and tags were removed

customer_reviews.title: Left a scar that was worse then the mole
customer_reviews.text: I followed instructions 100% and I was left with a red raised scar on my chest that is awful looking. I have tried to write this review several times with a picture attached and it has been denied. I read many reviews before I purchased this and did not see any that said it left a scar. I put Neosporin on it for almost a month to no avail. I am currently having to wear silicone tape to help remove the scar but nothing is working. Wish I would have just left the mole alone because this is my worst nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Welpwelp

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I had tried other products with no luck. Skinprov worked on my ugly skin tag. It took about 4 applications, but it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen N. Germain

customer_reviews.title: Review of Haloderm.
customer_reviews.text: I used Haloderm for a mole I had on my forehead that was about an eighth of an inch wide. I followed the directions for its use precisely as prescribed. It took about eight days for the scab to fall off. It has been eleven days and I can't even tell that I had a mole there. Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Remmen

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Worked in about a week and removed my skin tag completely. Tried the Apple cider route but had no luck even after about 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: T. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on a mole above my eye brow that my ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on a mole above my eye brow that my dermatologist refused to remove due to possible scaring. Still in the healing faze using a scar cream as a prentitive.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Eye skin tag removal
customer_reviews.text: I used this to remove skin tags from my upper eye lids. Amazing results. Follow the instructions very carefully. A small tip for eye skin tags, instructions state to leave product on for 45 minutes then wash. Don't do that in the eyes because it will sting your eyes. Instead wash off with q tip and apply water only in that section, not in your entire eye. Wash it carefully and dont get it in your eye. Super product. Saved me hundreds of dollars. 48 hours they are gone. I was able to do more than 4 tags so buy with confidence. It works
customer_reviews.author: The WB's

customer_reviews.title: The container is slightly larger than a single cell amoeba!
customer_reviews.text: You have used military grade lenses to focus in on the world smallest bottle! What a HUGE joke..... What a rip-off Amazon- you should be ashamed to sell something like this! This is NOT Low-Cost.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With The Product!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product! It was fabulous and worked just fine. I do not miss my large mole. It healed as if I never had a mole to begin with!
customer_reviews.author: Chamroeun T.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Work
customer_reviews.text: I did not have success with this product. I purchased two tubes and they were both very liquidy and runny when they arrived, no matter how much I massaged the bottle to mix it to make a thicker consistency. I wasn't sure if the heat played into it but the product was no good and didn't work at all for me.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina S.

customer_reviews.title: I applied the skin prov for just 2 nights and keep applying neosporin and after 1 week it looks good. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: It really works!! I have 2 mole on my face and in just 1 week the mole was gone. I applied the skin prov for just 2 nights and keep applying neosporin and after 1 week it looks good. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Labrecque

customer_reviews.title: Haloderm is NOT the same as Skinprov
customer_reviews.text: I used Skinprov almost 2 years agoon a mole I had on my scalp. I was skeptical but during the 2 week process I found it work very good. It created a big scab after a few days then the scab came off about 7 days later. The mole was gone. I called skinprov a "miracle cream". I've tried haloderm on 2 moles over the last 2 weeks and it won't scab. The contents are different. Haloderm must have very little blood root in it. I'm very disappointed. What happened to skinprov?? Why isn't it sold anymore?
customer_reviews.author: Bob Levy

customer_reviews.title: Infection After 5 Days
customer_reviews.text: My arm got infected after using this for 5 days. The skin tag never went away. Followed their directions. Can't recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Two Dogs

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money :'(
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes and am very disappointed. But after a couple weeks and using as directed, no results. In fact, the skin tag got WORSE. The directions are very specific and I followed them step-by-step...product is very messy, burns like crazy, and as I mentioned before, not only did it not work but this stuff made it worse :'( If the product was not already gone, I would seriously want a refund. But in hopes that it may work, I continued use until it's gone. #UnsatisfiedCustomer
customer_reviews.author: TaylorRenee

customer_reviews.title: NO WAY! I can't believe it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mole 30 years and in 4 days it's gone! I'm so amazed right now. This product works! Thank you skinprov for giving me back my confidence! 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Kills moles but leaves puffy red spots on pale skin
customer_reviews.text: I'll give this five stars even though I still have red, puffy bumps where my face moles used to live. It actually does kill the moles! I was scared to try this on my face but the potential cost of any medical treatment makes the risk of a $30 DIY product appealing. That said, I'll probably still need skin treatments to fix the red spots leftover, but the spots are slightly better looking than moles on me. My moles were about 1/8" diameter and I previously tried killing them with garlic and vinegar. They only got angrier. Halo derm worked after 1 overnight treatment. They scabbed up during the day after the treatment and healed over a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done and fairly fast (for me)
customer_reviews.text: Works unbelievably fast. I've got quite a handful of different moles on my body. Tiny red ones, larger dark ones, and flat dark ones. So far in just less than a week I've been able to reduce the dark ones to things that just don't have pigment and are significantly lowered, but haven't had as much success with the flat ones. Since this was great at getting rid of the larger and most annoying moles in just 2 or 3 daily applications, I'd have to say it's pretty fascinating stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Whispers

customer_reviews.title: Works Like They Said It Would
customer_reviews.text: Tried it a couple of days ago on two small moles on my face. After about two days they fell off. It really works. I really hate paying for something that doesn't work. I also appreciate the fact that they reach out to you and explain the steps that you will go through to achieve results. Thanks Dani.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony F. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions to the letter and had no real results, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: M. B. Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure this stuff works great as all the reviews say it has helped their problem area, but I had to return. I have multiple skin tags under my arms and this stuff would have been way more trouble that it’s worth. This product would be great for one mole or one skin tag but the process is just too much for the issue I had. The instructions are extensive, it’s more than just putting the cream on. I wouldn’t recommend for anyone wanting to remove a “cluster” of skin tags
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Painful but affective
customer_reviews.text: It rid me of a huge mole. This stuff should be applied once, with vaseline surrounding the moles perimeter. Allowed to dry overnight. The mole will be swollen and it will hurt.Take a shower and completely clean off the product. And apply neosporin or petroleum jelly. It will scab up. Apply neosporin a couple times a day. The mole or most of it will fall off in a few days. If it's not all gone, it will be way smaller. You can start again to get rid of what is left, if you can take the pain. I'm happy with the results. Use ambi or another type of face cream to get rid of any scarring.
customer_reviews.author: albert stubblefield

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I normally do not right review but I feel that I have to let people know how dangerous is this for your skin even after I followed all the steps I still have the mole
customer_reviews.author: Yennifer diaz

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT WORKS GREAT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. It removed a skin tag i have had forever within 1 week of starting treatment. Follow directions exactly, and you can be pretty sure that your skin tag will be gone in 3-5 applications....I wish i had found this product first..... Thank you, Thank you, Thank you!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: bummed
customer_reviews.text: So I am pretty bummed about this. I read through everyone's reviews and saw that many were having great success with this product so I thought I would try it. All I'm looking to use it for is two VERY small skin tags. That's it. I followed the directions closely. And can I tell you how hard it is to "file" something so small that moves continuously? Eventually ended up having to hold it still with tweezers! Even after all that, absolutely no change whatsoever. Disappointed, as I was truly hoping to get the results many others seem to have gotten.
customer_reviews.author: themayhemmommy

customer_reviews.title: Looks the same
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a flat mole. It did scab up and "eat" away at the mole but only made a crater in the center. When it healed, it filled back in.
customer_reviews.author: Teach82

customer_reviews.title: Product Works!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m usually very skeptical when it comes to products like this. I’ve always had a lot of moles and I’ve had some surgically removed and I’ve tried topical products as well. After reading the reviews I figured it wouldn’t hurt to give it a try. I have to say I’m 100% impressed. I’ve removed 3 moles so far, all on my face and the product actually worked! I followed the instructions and it performed exactly as described. The paste used to remove the moles does burn when applied, and it’s a bit uncomfortable during the healing process, but it’s to be expected totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Murray

customer_reviews.title: The results are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I waited a very longtime in order to make sure I got the results I needed :) for the price i was skeptical and the little tube, but i tried it more then once on my face to remove moles ive had my whole life since i was a kid. Im grateful for the results and images can describe how it healed and the process. Patience is key!! Def worth it💓
customer_reviews.author: Angela G ♡

customer_reviews.title: PATIENCE IS KEY. AND FOLLOW DIRECTIONS!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think this product will work but after reading the reviews I gave it a try and wow! I must say I am so pleased with the results. It took less than a week. The smaller mole below my lip took about 3 days. It was more sore and a little painful than my bigger mole that took about 6 days. The key to this is that you MUST exfoliate your mole prior to every application. And lots of patience. After the 3rd day I begin to leave the medication on overnight. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Gaochiia Lee

customer_reviews.title: So far not that good
customer_reviews.text: So far not that impressed. Got the directions on how to use this in an email and it said in the email not so good for skin tags yet in the description it says for moles and skin tags. I was told it may take up to 3 weeks. I’m going to keep trying because this little tube was not cheap but may have been a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: whitneyid

customer_reviews.title: Beware scars
customer_reviews.text: This left a red/white scar and possibly scar tissue now 3 months later...my fault for doing it on my face without trying it out (and for leaving it on overnight as someone did)....not sure if it removed all the mole either...a lot of work to try to get my skin back to 'normal' looking now...still doesn't look normal...They should have explained in greater detail/emphasis what can happen if you DON'T put sufficient barrier on the healthy skin....I somehow assumed like some other treatments it would only target unhealthy skin but my healthy skin scabbed up too.
customer_reviews.author: SSG

customer_reviews.title: Definitely did not work for me which is a shame ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely did not work for me which is a shame. Guess i'll leave it up to the professionals to remove my mole.
customer_reviews.author: lavolpettina

customer_reviews.title: Took off most of my mole, but not all of it
customer_reviews.text: I had a mole on the side of my chin for years. I was told by the dermatologist that they could remove it but there was a 50% chance it would come back. It took a few times, and after leaving it on over night, it does turn a darker scabby brown so it is embarrassing for a few days, but to be expected. It is still there, but not as raised and worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Yurkanin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price your paying this is not worth it. I read the directions and did everthing according to the instructions but it did not work. So I tried it twice in the same area but no change. It does sting but that goes away. The size of the tube to keep feels like were paying for a sample trail size. It literally is the size of my pinky.
customer_reviews.author: cmarcos84

customer_reviews.title: It Works as Described
customer_reviews.text: The product is a bit of a mystery to me, but does what it is supposed to do. First application onto a skin tag Friday afternoon for about 45 minutes, then applied again Saturday evening for overnight. On Sunday night, most of the skin tag fell off, leaving a small scab that came off Monday night. As of Tuesday night, the skin tag area is barely visible and well on the way to completely healed. The area was red and a little tender/sore the first couple of days and I wasn't sure the HaloDerm was going to work, but it did!
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Skin Tag Goes "Poof"!!
customer_reviews.text: I used Skinprov on a skin tag that was on my cheek, near my left nostril. The thing had been there for years and made me a bit self conscious. So I ordered this product, followed the directions, and within about 7-9 days the skin tag was gone! I'm at about 3 weeks now, and you cant tell anything was there! After about Day 3 the first scab with about half the skin tag fell off. I redid the treatment on the 2nd half, and a couple of days later it, too fell off. Now the area looks great!!
customer_reviews.author: Bob L.

customer_reviews.title: and when it did it was extremely painful (I followed all steps to a T)
customer_reviews.text: This product was awful! It took much longer for the area to scab over, and when it did it was extremely painful (I followed all steps to a T). The product actually burned my skin and caused discoloration. I have light olive skin and I now have a massive purple scar. Thanks for making the problem worse.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Sodono

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work at all
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. Followed directions to the T multiple times. I’m in the medical field and decided to try this instead of paying for a dermatologist appointment. It’s a waste of time and money and I don’t believe the reviews saying it works- it 100% does nothing
customer_reviews.author: Lfisher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So an update after 90+ days after using this product. Area where moles use to be have developed new moles. Smaller in size and spotty. I cannot in good faith give a favorable review of this product which is sad as I saw such positive results after the moles had first scabbed over.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Followed instructions. Used repeatedly. Still have skin tag. I finally used cheap wart remover on the skin tag and it worked .
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Go to doctor's office and get it done right!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I never bought or used this product. The multiple applications and duration needed to eat away small mole or skin tag is not worth the time or effort. Honestly, for another $100 bucks (without insurance) a doctor could have frozen my skin tag and moles more comfortably without scaring. I would not use this product if you are working in an area of your body that is highly visible. Such a shame that other reviewers gave this product high marks.
customer_reviews.author: westbank3

customer_reviews.title: Reaction
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to remove a tag on my left temple - followed the directions to a tee but after 5 days my left eye lid and under my eye on cheek bone is very red and swollen - after first 45 min application - I did overnight as directed but had to get up in the middle of the night and wash off because it was throbbing so badly - still throbbing!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Van Matre

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I have had a mole on my chin for many years. I put this ointment on for three days and it turned black and had a scab. On the fifth day, I was washing my face and the mole fell off in my hand. Nothing short of amazing as far as I'm concerned. The mole has now been off about ten days and the site has nearly finished healing and my wife says she can't even see where the mole use to be. Highly recommend this product---it does what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.author: S. Landburg

customer_reviews.title: I had hope
customer_reviews.text: Honestly followed the instructions on the same mole and nothing happened. I reaaaaally had hope itll work based on the reviews. Waste of money dont do it peeps.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've had a raised mole on a sensitive "private " area, my whole life. After a couple applications, it is gone! I couldn't be more pleased with this product! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Nick1

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy it because it does not work for my case as described
customer_reviews.author: Big buyer

customer_reviews.title: Follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: I had mixed success with this product. It took away some moles (skin colored and dark brown) permanently with no issues, took away a couple that returned a few months later, took away some that left a light colored scar for almost a year and took away some that still have an awful scar. I probably didn't follow the directions perfectly. Use with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More please!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered 2nd tube. I'm addicted now. After age 50, I developed several moles on my face. I had a very ugly one on the tip of my nose. My family doctor said they come with age and I would need to live with them. Guess what? I said "goodbye" to them!! I love this product!! The roughing up the mole was the most difficult, but that was still easier than going to dermatologist. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised with excellent results
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty skeptical that this would work but wanted to try something relatively painless before having a dermatologist remove the small skin tag I had on my neck. It was pretty typical looking, small but protruding quite a bit with a very thin base. I followed the instructions exactly and then 24 hours later couldn’t tell whether it needed another application or not, so I figured I’d do one more round. The first step is to exfoliate the surface with an emery board so when I went to gently do this for the second round, The skin tag fell right away with zero pain or scarring. I am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: reliable
customer_reviews.text: The directions say it can come off in 6 to 16 applications depending on the stubbornness of the mole. I was lucky enough to get it off in 5. I did 3, 45 minute sessions on day one and two one day two. Then on day three the mole fell off. I highly recommend taking really hot showers for at least 15 minutes b.c it helps the skin to get soft which helped the moles come off nice and easy without it coming off prematurely or anything. Very good product. I didn't even use vasoline to protect the surrounding skin, just made sure I left the stuff on the mole itself and I was okay.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Mole still standing
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions for a mole I've had forever, it scabbed like the directions described but never left.the scab eventually was sloughed off during showering and the mole remains. The product says it doesn't remove all moles. I'll keep it to try on a smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!!! It removed a small ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works!!! It removed a small mole on my neck that really bothered me. The only reason I gave it four stars is it did irritate the surrounding skin very badly. Word of caution: make sure the unblemished skin is covered in vaseline (which I did) and when a scab forms on the mole/skin tag, do not apply any more Skinprov!!
customer_reviews.author: Lodo263

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Using this product was so scary! I followed the instructions to a T. The mole came off but what was left is 10x worse! I was so scared it was getting infected after all the precautions that I saw a doctor about it and they told me to never use it again. Wish I could get my money back. Ugh. Not to mention how tiny the bottle is.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri L. McLennan

customer_reviews.title: Regret
customer_reviews.text: Either does not remove the mole, or the mole will grow back if it does. Left a scar worse than the mole and I followed instructions perfectly. There is no telling what your results will be and it is not worth this, please don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I developed 6 skin tags during my pregnancy, they ranged from incredibly small to noticeable and a couple would catch on sweaters, necklaces, even my hair. This product is amazing! One application and by day 3 they either flaked off or I used a tweezer (not recommended but it was effortless) I'm so happy to be able to rub my neck and not feel these awful tags! You will feel a slight burning sensation temporarily but it goes away. Sleeping with the bandaid was more uncomfortable than the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: BRANDI ROBINSON

customer_reviews.title: Painful and ineffective
customer_reviews.text: This product comes with a toothpick and nail file so that you can scrape the skin tag before applying the painful liquid. That is hard to do without also scraping the surrounding skin. I followed the directions for many days without results. I finally gave up and purchased a different product which was easier to use and actually worked.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Van Norden

customer_reviews.title: The product should be discontinued.
customer_reviews.text: Pathetic product, beware consumers, it literally burnt my skin. This is completely useless product which should be discontinued, it’s a complete threat to your skin.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to believe the hype, but didnt work.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted for this to work so badly but it did not. It just burned my skin and turned it brown and scabbed and then my mole is still there. I tried it numerous times on different moles and followed the directions perfectly. I got my excited for nothing. Will be getting refund.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: So Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I had really high hopes for this to help get rid of a large mole that I have on the back of my neck. I followed the directions EXACTLY, the mole scabbed up as promised, and while I was following the guidelines for after it scabs, the scab finally fell off and the mole was still there exactly the way it was before I began treating it. A waste of money for me and now unfortunately will have to spend lots more getting it removed through my dermatologist.
customer_reviews.author: Kalie

customer_reviews.title: waste OF MONEY HOW ARE U GUYS STILL EVEN ON AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: Trash THIS IS THE SECOND TIME I BOUGHT THIS I FIRST BOUGHT THE ADVANCE VERSION DIDN'T WORK .I SAID WHY NOT TRY THE OTHER ONE DIDN'T WORK NEITHER! ....... I USED ALL OF IT ON ONE MOLE DIDN'T DO ANYTHING JUST SCABED UP AND SCAB CAME OFF AND MOLE WAS STILL THERE I AT LEAST DID 4 SESSIONS👎👎👎👎👎🚫🚫🚫 ....DONT WASTE UR MONEY ON THIS 100000% A WASTE AND ITS EXPENSIVE ITS SO TINY SMALLER THAN A TRAVEL TOOTHPASTE
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: really great, be patient and follow directions!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to remove a couple skin tags on my leg and then also used it on a mole on my neck. This stuff works really well, but it definitely is a long process and will make the area very tender. When I did my neck, I had a bandaid on for probably close to a month. I do have a scar on my neck but I prefer that to the mole. The skin tags on my leg left no scar at all. This stuff really works, follow the directions to a T!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed with the size of this product for the price ...
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed with the size of this product for the price been using it for the past 6 weeks and nothing has happened yet besides my skin be stained and very dry.
customer_reviews.author: Indira S.

customer_reviews.title: Not expected but does the job
customer_reviews.text: It did it’s job. I had a small light mole on my forehead and it took the mole away, only problem is that I think it scarred the area because I am now left with a indent instead of a bump. I feel it is a lot more noticeable than the mole I had. The scab might have fell off too soon but I followed instructions like said. I hope it is just still healing and that it won’t stay like this, other than that I recommend this for regular moles and that you should test it on a part of your body you have a mole you don’t mind, and try to do face last.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this didnt work for me. I did it followed instructions all the way through. It has been a week and a half and the mole is still there and now feels rough and more raised. Going to have to go to the dermatologist after this. Update: the mole fell off today! I thought it wasn’t working but I guess it was just taking longer than expected. However, I do have a small crater. Will update in a few weeks once healed
customer_reviews.author: noelle mena

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Tried Haloderm twice first time the mole came right back second time left a scar bigger then what was there before, luckily just in my leg I’d definitely recommend not using this stuff on your face. Overall just disappointed with the product
customer_reviews.author: Albert Einstein

customer_reviews.title: HaloDerm may work wonders for others. However, HaloDerm ...
customer_reviews.text: HaloDerm may work wonders for others. However, HaloDerm was used on my GF she did not get the results she was looking for. Followed instructions-directions given from the HaloDerm on the back. We tried other ways after failing thrice times. Over-all still try it out and give their product a chance.
customer_reviews.author: amznjac

customer_reviews.title: My tags dissappeared completely with just one application. 3days for a lot to fall off.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions too thoroughly I guess. I had a lot of tiny to small skin tags left and right sides of my neck. I have been scared of them looking bizarre in the future that's why i sought for solution early. I did get my skin bruised and hurt while trying to scrape the surface of the tags because they were tiny dots. But it was worth it because 3 days later while washing my face I noticed nothing on my neck just drying wounds i got as a result of the scraping. My neck is smooth and my skin is gradually regaining its bright color. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Original

customer_reviews.title: I've used this stuff for the past 2 years with great results
customer_reviews.text: It works if you give it time, and follow the directions. I've removed several skin tags and one large one on the side of my face the size of a dime. Use a bandage to cover at night to keep the product in place. Safe and painless for me.
customer_reviews.author: Fleur

customer_reviews.title: SO SURPRISED THIS WORKED!
customer_reviews.text: I had a large mole on my side and a small one on my collar bone I have been insecure about for years! I debated over this product for months and finally broke down and bought it. I wish I had bought this years ago! Very minor stinging sensation, as described in the instructions and a tad messy to apply, but as long as you are thorough with Step 2, this does exactly as described and both moles fell off in less than a week! Very shocked and so pleasantly surprised! There is a slight pink spot where the moles were but I am sure they will fade with time, no different than when any other scab has healed.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised refund
customer_reviews.text: Product burned my skin tags made the situation worst they are still there dont recommend it. My skin still feels like it's on fire smells like red chili pepper. 🌶
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: After doctor refused to take off my skin tags and mole off my neck due to it being "cosmetic" I decided to do it myself. Bought this not knowing if it would work, but it did. After about 5 days the scab and mole came right off. Now it is red there but it is not completely healed, which I am sure it will. Follow directions to the letter and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: It completely worked.
customer_reviews.text: I received the product on Friday and immediately began the procedure. I followed every instruction to the letter. On Sat nite the skin tag had turned black. There was no change on Sunday. I did not pick on it or anything, Just left it alone and hoped for the best. OMG. On Monday it was completely gone. No trace whatsoever. This is a miracle product. Wish I had learned about it sooner. Just for the record this review was not requested or paid for. I am really the customer. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Brad B.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product to remove a mole on my face and it did nothing. I followed directions and was unfortunately disappointed since it was so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jaynareiko

customer_reviews.title: Worked!!! Be patient
customer_reviews.text: It deff worked I used it on my mole for 3 days straight actually kept the product on when I went to work with a bandaid on it then started putting antibiotic ointment on with a baindaid so far healing and no mole it’s still raised skin but maybe it’s still healing? It deff worked tho trying it on my cherry mole next I’ll also put a review for that one
customer_reviews.author: Darian taylor

customer_reviews.title: I don't regret buying this at all!
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE BUY THIS PRODUCT! I have been struggling with my self image for YEARS because of my moles. I followed the instructions with application and it works! The only thing was that I picked at my face after using it because it's a nervous habit. It stings a bit when you first use it, but it's not painful. It's worth it compared to all those years of insecurity. If you start vinegar after using Haloderm and your skin is fully healed, I recommend using The Ordinary lactic acid and Cerave retinol serum for scarring. Best skincare product I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Addison Mackey

customer_reviews.title: This really works!
customer_reviews.text: I liked that I could get rid of some strawberry spots that I had on my own. This works. You are left with black scabs for weeks where you use this product so it does take more time than going to to a dermatologist to get rid of unsightly growths. I had these areas covered up so it didn't matter. You have to scrape the spots surface first and I purchased some disposable scalpels but you could use some other implement. A tooth pick and nail file is provided to assist with this. You apply the cream and leave it on for 45 minutes. Then just leave the area alone for weeks until it falls off.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Stiller

customer_reviews.title: It really does work
customer_reviews.text: I love that when I was having problems with pain there was always someone emailing me asking how I am and if the pain went away. I will be honest I was scared, but after talking with one of them my neveres relaxed and now I am in the healing process. I had a bigger mole than I realized and it caused some pain. I am thankful someone always emailed me back, very quickly, may I add and was there to help the best way they could. I would recommend this company if anyone wanted a mole removed, it does work. I would say it hurts a lot more than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jacy

customer_reviews.title: doesn't seem like it pulled the root of it off
customer_reviews.text: I havent really seen results with the product yet. I purchased it for a skin tag on my face, which says are actually easier to remove. I first used it on July 4th or 5th for the suggest time. Then I used it a day or 2 later and left it on overnight. Then a few days later I left it on overnight again. It scabbed for a while, but when the skin flaked off its still there, doesn't seem like it pulled the root of it off. I applied it again over night about 2 days ago so its scabbing again.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney M

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Used it for several days as directed and even put on way more than recommended the last 2 days...and the tip of the skin tag dried out but that was it. I ended up tying floss around it with a bandage and it was gone the next day no thanks to this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Wait, Buy This TODAY!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical, but I received the product 4 days ago. The Mole is gone. Day 1 it burned a little when applying the product (applied 3 x) Day 2 it crusted up and I applied more product again. Day 3 it fell off and was a little tender to the touch. Today is day 4 and it feels & looks great. My only regret is not ordering this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Tarabyt

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I like that I don't have to go to the doctor to have my skin tags removed or having to cut them off myself! This is easy and if you follow instructions, you can avoid injuring yourself. It comes with a tiny blue file (like a fingernail filer) to file off the top part of the skin tag or mole before you apply to the part you are going to treat. It tube is very tiny.
customer_reviews.author: Thumbs-Up!!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I was very skeptical, as the mole I wanted to remove was on my face behind my cheekbone! I followed the directions exactly, & it took leas than a week from start to finish. There is still a slight indent where the mole was, but it’s filling in & you can’t really see it! Shared the rest of my tube with a co- worker!
customer_reviews.author: Gramma Deli

customer_reviews.title: This didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I used it as recommended and nothing. no drying, no crust. 3 weeks later I had to go to the dermatologist to burn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Roma B

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works. I used it on a few moles and it definitely removed them. It takes a few weeks for the moles to fall off and sometimes they need to be treated again but it really works. It only hurts a little and works best if you are able to file down the moles a little. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to use. You must file skin tag and not skin surrounding and apply only to skin tag. Considering they are tiny, this is difficult. You also need Vaseline, Neosporin and Q-Tips (not included). I did not find the product to be effective. I did feel skin tingle as if the product was doing something, however no results even after repeated uses on the same skin tag.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work at all. I've tried to treat the same mole 4 different times and this product does literally nothing. Not even a tingle or redness
customer_reviews.author: Amy k

customer_reviews.title: No change
customer_reviews.text: I used this several times and see no change, not even like trying to do something on my skin. It was dark in color like brown, don't know if it was damage or not.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Yes it works!
customer_reviews.text: Waited until after I'd used it to review. It works! Used on both skin tags and moles. It does work. requires a couple of applications, and patience to allow it to work but it will! Not painful at all, minor burn upon application but not bad at all
customer_reviews.author: William A Duvall

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed with how well this works, just follow the directions.
customer_reviews.text: Right now I am in the healing process, and it's looking great. My mole feel off on day nine. I've been applying neosporin 3 times a day since then. It's looking really good. The area is still a little sore and irritated, but not bad. This mole was on my arm, so it was easy to hide during the process. The one on my neck and the one on my face may not be so easy, so I am trying to time it so I can be in hiding for a few weeks. Other than that, this has turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work.its rock hard paste ,that is very hard to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Holy cow it worked
customer_reviews.text: My only regret is that I didn't do it years ago! It removed the extremely annoying skin tag right on my bra line and it removed the 2 pencil eraser size moles on both sides of my neck. Those moles bothered me everytime I wore a seat belt or a necklace or even a scarf. However, it was quite a long process, it took me at least 8 applications of the cream. I kept having the moles partially scab and only pieces fall off. But it finally worked and I'm so glad I did it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: I used this last night and I didn't get a ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked!!! I didn't think it was going to at first then it just fell off after day 3!!! Defiantly would recommend!! I'm still in shock. Saved me a ton of money if I would have went to the doctor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Location important!
customer_reviews.text: This could work for smaller skin tags but wasnt successful for us. My daughters skin tag was near her armpit making it difficult to apply ointment without burning the skin under her arm when she lowered her arm. The scraping also wasnt pleasant. I should have returned this after our 1st couple failed attempts, but never hot around to it. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KLH

customer_reviews.title: Removes moles- start with the worst though!
customer_reviews.text: This really did work to remove the moles, however I only had enough to remove 2 completely and not the third and that was a bit of a disappointment. It’s a little pricey for me to purchase another tube, so I’m glad I started with the two moles I wanted to get rid of most. However it does what it says and the customer support is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Awseome stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works so fast. I was absolutely amazed! I've tried apple cider vinegar on skin tags before and it worked fine but it took alot longer and when I tried it on a mole, it looked like it worked but it only took the top layer off and a few weeks later it came back. I'm so happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mdpayne23

customer_reviews.title: This product DOES NOT WORK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work as advertised. I applied this product 4 seperate times and got zero results. You offer a money back guarantee and I would like my money back. I am not happy at all with this product and it was a lot more expensive than the alternatives on the market.
customer_reviews.author: the best sim yet

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for everyone sadly
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work for me. It scabbed over but the scab fell off and my mole looked the exact same!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Looks Promising
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product 2 days ago. I have followed the directions precisely. One mole has started to show progress but with red inflamed tissue all around. I have started using the Neosporin ointment on the red area. The second area I have been working on shows small progress with no redness to the surrounding area. I applied Vaseline to both surrounding areas but apparently one location is more sensitive, my leg. I am going to continue with the product for the recommended 3-5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to apply
customer_reviews.text: Still evaluating but here are first impressions. There are only several drops of chemical in the tube. It is brown and almost impossible to tell where it has been applied to brown moles. It was very dry and it did not stick to the moles. Most of the compound fell off. What remains does burn the mole. Reserving judgement at present stage, but the dryness makes it hard to apply to mole.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: It worked! I was surprised at how far under the skin the mole was. Im glad i chose this over the doctor. My mole was on my privates. It worked nearly as described in the pictures sent with the medicine tube. I got worried, but the day after i touched it while switching the band aid and it fell of. Seems to be healing fine. Thank you!!! I will be recommending this for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Shauni

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: Ok so make sure you read the instructions and not be like me thinking you know what you are doing. Me and my boyfriend had a couple skin tags. Mine weren’t as big as his so mine were easier to come off. His took a couple applications but it definitely did the job by removing it little by little. I do have to say shake the tube up really good. I made the mistake and didn’t a couple times and it didn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Dotson

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this product and would buy it again myself if ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a rather large mole and skin tag. Took about 3 weeks for the skin tag to come off and about a few months for the mole to fall off but they both did. Since both took longer than expected, I had doubts along the way. But the results were definitely worth the wait. I would highly recommend this product and would buy it again myself if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: HaloDerm Skin Tag Remover & Mole Remover - All Natural Skin Tag Cream - Remove up to 3 Skin Tags (FAST Results In As Little As 3-5 Days) - Industry Leading Safe & Effective Formula
feature_bullets: #1 SKIN TAG REMOVER & MOLE REMOVER – Unlike most other treatment methods, HaloDerm TARGETS THE ROOT of your skin tag or mole and removes it for good.

FAST & EFFECTIVE HOMEOPATHIC FORMULA – This cost-effective method provides incredibly fast results. We know moles and skin tags can be annoying, bothersome & even embarrassing at times. We created this formula with the goal of helping people feel & look their best! In most cases, skin tags and moles will fall off naturally within 7 - 10 days.
ACID FREE FORMULA – Our SAFE & NATURAL formula is gentle enough for all skin types and can be used on the face and body.
SAFE ALTERNATIVE TO PAINFUL DEVICES – No need to use laser devices or pay expensive surgical fees.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
